edu.rit.LightBikesClient

Class Bike.Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.LightBikesClient.Bike.Movement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Bike

    class Bike.Movement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runnable inner class which faciliates the systematic movement of the Bike in the GUI based on the time delay set in the Bike, the value of the Bike object's direction, and the gameState. The Movement thread will complete and exit once the gameState has been set to false.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Movement() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      Begins movement of the this Bike object within the GUI, moving the Bike at the interval specifed in Bike.DELAY_IN_MILLIS and registering the changes with both the Grid and the NetworkConnector created by Grid.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
